breaking_changes_1: Seems like you have a version of Championify that can't be updated on it's own. Hit the download button to get the latest version!
error_1: Did you try running as admin?
error_2: Or your antivirus/firewall is blocking Championify?
error_4: If not, I need your help in fixing and improving Championify! With your permission by hitting 'Upload Log' I can look over the log file and see what went wrong on your system. No personal information is ever sent. Thanks!
select_folder: You need to select your folder first!
